divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way to church and before I got on the overpass to cross I-30, I saw an object in the sky. It looked like a greenish white light that arced over the trees. It was first a thick line then mushroomed to a sphere-like object that collapsed back to the thick line and continuing arcing toward the ground. I yelled for my daughter to look to the north and she observed the same object. The line then mushroomed once more into a sphere like object and then collapsed into the line again arcing toward the trees. That's all we saw. It was on Sunday, 11-24-02 at about 5:55 p.m.
Summary: greenish white light from line to sphere and back
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Texarkana
There were no other sightings in Texarkana on or around November 24th 2002
